item.title: A giant asteroid hit Earth, but its crater is missing

item.title: Asteroid Ryugu’s hidden waters could explain how Earth got its oceans
item.description: Ryugu’s samples reveal that water activity on asteroids lasted far longer than scientists thought, possibly reshaping theories of how Earth gained its...

item.title: Forged in fire: The 900°C heat that built Earth’s stable continents
item.description: New research reveals that Earth’s continents owe their stability to searing heat deep in the planet’s crust. At more than 900°C, radioactive elements ...

item.title: Scientists just found real teeth growing on a fish’s head
item.description: Scientists discovered true teeth growing on the head of the spotted ratfish, a distant shark relative. The toothed structure, called a tenaculum, help...
